verses.verse: HE who refuses reproof and stiffens his neck shall suddenly be destroyed, and that without remedy.
When the righteous are many, the people increase; but when the wicked are in authority, the people groan.
He who loves wisdom rejoices his father; but he who keeps company with harlots shall lose his substance.
The king by justice enriches the land; but a wicked man causes it to be in want.
A man who flatters his neighbor spreads a net for his feet.
An evil man shall be ensnared in his wickedness; but the righteous shall sing and rejoice.
A righteous man considers the cause of the poor; but the wicked has no understanding to regard it.
Scornful men set cities on fire; but wise men turn away wrath.
A wise man contends with a fool, and when he is angry, he laughs and does not scoff.
Bloodthirsty men hate the innocent; but the righteous have compassion upon them.
A fool utters all his wrath; but a wise man uses his mind.
If a ruler listens to lies, all his servants are wicked.
The poor man and the oppressor meet together, and the LORD lightens the eves of both.
The king who faithfully judges the people, his throne shall be established for ever.
The rod and reproof give wisdom; but a child who lacks discipline brings shame upon his mother.
When the wicked are multiplied, transgression increases; but the righteous shall rejoice in their fall.
Correct your son, and he shall give you rest; yea, he shall give delight to your soul.
When the wicked men multiply, the people are ruined; but he who keeps the law, blessed is he.
A servant will not be corrected by words; for he knows then that he will not be beaten.
When you see a man who is hasty in his words, know that a fool is better than he.
He who is given to pleasures from his youth will be a servant, and in the end will groan.
An angry man stirs up strife, and a furious man abounds in transgression.
A man's pride shall bring him low; but his meekness shall add to his honor.
He who is a partner with a thief hates his own soul; they put him under oaths, but he does not confess.
The iniquity of a man becomes a stumblingblock to him; but he who puts his trust in the LORD shall become strong.
Many seek the ruler's favor; but a man's judgment comes from the LORD.
An unjust man is an abomination to the just; and a right way is an abomination to the wicked.
